comments.html:
No need to slow down because you are more educating the people & a day will come when people will look CT3 site instead of cisco if the behaviour of cisco remains the same.
But really you are doing great job.

comments.name: Shivlu Jain

comments.html:
Cisco has moved on. IOS is pretty much on cruise control, and it's been there for years. New releases and new features are rare, half baked and poorly supported. They still produce wonderful press releases, white papers and case studies. Working code - not so much.

But hey, if the rumors are correct, they'll be selling servers soon. I bet that'll help them focus :)
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html:
I agree they are not producing as they did before.
It seems they are going with the overall market direction, things that brings high revenues.

Anyways you are doing a great job here Ivan
